title: Bigos stew
description: This is the national dish of Poland. It can be made with any kind of meat from pork to rabbit or venison, but should always have spicy Polish sausage. Like most stews this tastes better left overnight and reheated the next day making it a great dish to prepare in advance for an evening with friends.
ingredients: 200g/7oz fresh chopped tomatoes or 400g tin tomatoes
300g/10½oz smoked Polish sausage, such as kabanas, chopped
